definition: frank/outspoken/ready/settled/in order/(old) to deal with/to handle
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
variant of 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]

sentences.english: Yeats describes mankind's fleshly predicament as a soul fastened to a dying animal.
sentences.chinese: 描繪了當靈魂依附於瀕死的動物時人類肉體的窘境。

sentences.english: I was hoaxed into believing his lies.
sentences.chinese: 我上了當，相信他的謊言。

sentences.english: Her teeth are so yellow that traffic slows down when she smiles.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙太黃了當她笑着露出牙齒時，汽車見了就減速。

sentences.english: In fact, it is less clear-cut than that.
sentences.chinese: 但事實上並沒有這麼清晰了當。

sentences.english: The development of multi - parameter patient monitor was reviewed in this article.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了當參數病人監護儀的國內外發展概況。

sentences.english: Bugfix when comparing two or more far-field output data files.
sentences.chinese: 修正了當比較兩個或兩個以上的遠場輸出的數據文件。

sentences.english: They cooked these and served them with liquor.
sentences.chinese: 他們把這些炒了當下酒菜。

sentences.english: It describes when someone else excepts accepts responsibility to act in the interests of a child.
sentences.chinese: 它描述了當某些人同意承擔照顧兒童的責任。

sentences.english: Fix a displaying problem when song name is too long.
sentences.chinese: 修復了當歌曲名太長時的顯示問題。

sentences.english: Bugfix when selecting more than 32 var's to optimize.
sentences.chinese: 修正了當選擇超過32個變種的優化。

sentences.english: Fix line numbers space problem while folding.
sentences.chinese: 修復了當摺疊時行號空間的問題。

sentences.english: The swindlers had roped into a number of gullible persons.
sentences.chinese: 那個騙子使許多人上了當。
他的鎮靜使我們上了當。

sentences.english: Processing of the query when asynchrony is enabled is illustrated by the figure below.
sentences.chinese: 下面的圖中闡釋了當啓用異步時，查詢的處理過程。

sentences.english: At last she realized her dream of becoming an actress.
sentences.chinese: 她最終實現了當演員的夢想。

sentences.english: He was bluffed into supposing I was ill prepared.
sentences.chinese: 他上了當，以爲我準備不足。
